loanReference.default: Enter your loan reference number in the correct format

brpNumber.default: Enter your BRP number in the correct format; for example, ‘ZU1234567’

dateOfBirth.default: Enter your date of birth in the correct format; for example, 31 3 1980
dateOfBirth.over18: Enter a valid date of birth. You must be over 18 to accept
dateOfBirth.before: Enter a date that is in the past

contactTypes.default: Select how we can contact you

email.default: Enter your email address in the correct format

phone.default: Enter your phone number in the correct format
